name: Dead Set Wheels
description:
The parking lot is about to blow up! Get your car, drive through the gangster mob, and disarm the bomb on time!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move.
    • W/Up to accelerate
    • S/Down to reverse
    • Tap A and D/Left and Right to steer
  • R/Space to eject current magazine
    • Slow down to reload.
  • Shift to handbrake/hard brake

SFX Credits:
Drift SFX
Gunshot SFX
Blood Splat SFX
Whoosh SFX 

Note: Game can be rather difficult. Here are a few tips:

  • Conserve your ammo. Magazines are based purely on chance. Run over the goons instead. Save your bullets for barrels and enemies you missed.
  • Familiarize with the shift key. It will help a lot.
  • Gather as much time as possible through:
    • All Killed: Don't leave a single enemy alive.
      • Every alive enemy will reduce your time!
    • No Gun: Don't shoot even once in the section.
    • Scratchless: Don't take damage. (With enough training, it's possible to run over certain goons before they shoot/take proper aim)
    • On Flames: Leaving a section with <= 10 health will reduce your time. Don't do that.
